prime.gui.core.ISkin

type
interface
extends
prime.core.traits.IDisposable
available in
swf
Interface for a skin. Order of execution of methods of a skin: - IUIComponent creates skin - ISkin->constructor - createStates() - createChildren() - IUIComponent.createChildren() - IUIComponent -> ISkin.setupSkin()

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

changeOwner(o : IUIComponent) : Void

childrenCreated() : Void

This method is called after the owner has created its children. It can be used e.g. to place them in a different container or change their depts or values.

createChildren() : Void

Method for adding extra state objects to the skin

dispose() : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IDisposable

disposeChildren() : Void

Dispose method for all the extra states that where created for this skin.

isDisposed() : Bool

Method indicating wether the skin is disposed or not

isFocusOwner(target : prime.gui.events.UserEventTarget) : Bool

Abstract method. Is called by the owner when an object wants to check if the owner has focus. The skin can check if the target is one of its children and then return true or false.

validate(changes : Int) : Void

Method is called when the owner is validated and allows the skin to update itself after some properties have changed.
